title: Keep dcing in game
body:
Me and my friends were playing league and randomly we all dced. we live in separate houses , but we are all in the same call. When we dc, we can still talk to each other fine. I don't know if its the game that is doing this or the internet company. 

HELP!

replies.body: Where did you disconnect, and has this happened more than once or did this only happen one time?
Its happening today in the pass 2-4 games and late last night.  It randomly disconnecting us and reconnecting us.  This is new to me.
When I do disconnect, I still have internet, I can still go on facebok, youtube, Pandora.

In that case, this probably isn't caused by an Internet Service overall, but rather, somewhere between your PC and our servers. These issues are often impacted by specific network settings that conflict with League, so I'd like you to work through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure this isn't the case for you.

Please let me know if those steps helped at all.
